hero.title: Live Music That Moves You
hero.subtitle: Professional guitar performances and blues entertainment for venues, events, and special occasions across Melbourne
hero.description: From intimate acoustic sessions to dynamic blues performances, I bring authentic musical experiences that connect with your audience and create lasting memories.
hero.backgroundAlt: Rrish performing live with acoustic guitar in an intimate venue setting

wedding_bands.title: Wedding Bands
wedding_bands.description: Create unforgettable moments for your special day with professional live music for wedding ceremonies, receptions, and celebrations. Customized setlists that reflect your love story and keep guests entertained throughout your event.
highlights: First dance and special moment songs

corporate_events.title: Corporate Events
corporate_events.description: Enhance your business functions, networking events, conferences, and corporate celebrations with sophisticated live music that creates the perfect professional atmosphere and helps guests connect.

venue_performances.title: Venue Performances
venue_performances.description: Regular live music performances for restaurants, bars, clubs, and private venues. From intimate acoustic sessions to energetic blues sets, I create the perfect atmosphere for your establishment and patrons.

credentials: Specialized in blues and acoustic genres
